name: Archeonimals - Tap Dig Collect
description:
Archeonimals - Tap Dig Collect

It is time to shake things up!
"Archeonimals - Tap Dig Collect" is a unique mix of your classic match-3 and your team game. Simplicity and strategy unite in this FREE puzzle adventure!

Explore locations full of chimes and booby traps to reveal maximum treasures! Choose wisely your companions for your adventures and play with their awesome powers! Make your Museum Tower the most prestigious there is - THE NEXT LEGENDARY EXPLORER CAN BE YOU!

Here are 5 reasons why you gonna love Of Mine And Monsters:

**PLAY WITH NO LIMITS!**
Fancy a break? Or you have a lot of time to kill? Just play it. No lives, no energy, nothing will stop you from enjoying the game as much as you want. There is always a level for you to play!

**TAP! DIG! UNTAP!**
Every tap you make is a gem you take! Play casually or seriously - all will come in time! Buckle up, power-up your Archeonimals, sharpen your tools, deepen your skills.
**COLLECT DOZENS OF CREATURES**
Assemble your team of Archeonimals and go on mine-cracking puzzles.

**EXPLORE EXCITING EXPEDITIONS**
The Museum Tower is a child's dream, and it's up to you to reach its top and beyond. Go on expeditions and fulfill requests - Deep down, dig up rare and endless treasures!
PLEASE NOTE! Archeonimals - Tap Dig Collect is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Privacy policy: https://archeonimals-tap-di.flycricket.io/privacy.html
